title: MAKE BRUISERS GREAT AGAIN
body: These "so-called" juggernauts are trash and bruisers have not been good. Riot claims they're giving us great potential in these champions but they aren't bringing their best. The bruisers in 2017 are terrible, just terrible. Sad!

replies.body: As someone who predominantly plays mages, I'd rather have juggernauts be good than bruisers. You can lock-down juggernauts or avoid them- can't really do that with bruisers.

> [{quoted}](name=Attticus Finch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Es9y2hh5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-14T22:16:46.246+0000)
>
> As someone who predominantly plays mages, I'd rather have juggernauts be good than bruisers. You can lock-down juggernauts or avoid them- can't really do that with bruisers.

Juggernauts aren't good either.

It is mostly the dps bruisers that are struggling. They need to survive a long time to do dps because they are melee. Unfortunately, it is easy to take them down in 5 seconds while kiting them. They usually have bad stickiness. Also vayne exists.

> [{quoted}](name=Dasdi96,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Es9y2hh5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-14T22:15:04.752+0000)
>
> It is mostly the dps bruisers that are struggling. They need to survive a long time to do dps because they are melee. Unfortunately, it is easy to take them down in 5 seconds while kiting them. They usually have bad stickiness. Also vayne exists.

Not 5 seconds, it's more like 1-2 seconds
